name: url-shortener-service
description: URL Shortener Service with Horizontal Scaling

scripts.docker:restart: docker compose up -d --build && docker compose down && docker compose up -d
scripts.docker:logs: docker compose logs -f shortener-service-1 shortener-service-2 shortener-service-3 shortener-service-4 shortener-nginx-lb shortener-bucket-postgres shortener-urls-postgres
scripts.docker:stats: docker stats shortener-service-1 shortener-service-2 shortener-service-3 shortener-service-4 shortener-nginx-lb shortener-bucket-postgres shortener-urls-postgres
